You can use to copy your resources to the SharePoint server:
Configure a new connection to your SharePoint site in the Data Source Explorer view.To watch our video demonstration about connecting to repository located on a SharePoint server, go to .
Browse your new SharePoint connection site and select the SitePages folder.
Create a folder named author-component using the New Folder contextual menu action.
Upload your resources to this folder using the Import Files contextual menu action.
